original_text: It is the same for us who are believers. We have received God's Spirit as the first of his gifts to us, but we also cry inside ourselves. We are waiting for the time when God will finish his great work. Then we will belong to him completely as his children. Our bodies will be free from the power of sin.
korean_text: 그뿐 아니라 또한 우리 곧 성령의 처음 익은 열매를 받은 우리까지도 속으로 탄식하여 양자 될 것 곧 우리 몸의 속량을 기다리느니라

sentences.original_text: It is the same for us who are believers.
We have received God's Spirit as the first of his gifts to us,
but we also cry inside ourselves.
We are waiting for the time when God will finish his great work.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 위대한 사역을 마치실 때를 기다리고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then we will belong to him completely as his children.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 그의 자녀로서 온전히 그에게 속하게 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Our bodies will be free from the power of sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 몸은 죄의 권세에서 자유로울 것입니다.
